GeneralInfo - Interface in fr.dauphine.robombastic
General informations about the game given to the Bot.
getAllAliveFriendlyBots() - Method in interface fr.dauphine.robombastic.CurrentBotInfo
Returns all alive bots from the same army that the current bot.

Returns the arena height

Returns the arena width.

Returns delay in turn between a drop and the explosion of bombs.
